item.title: Report E-2024070645
item.description:
Report E-2024070645

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-22
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ROADRUNNER TRANSPORTATION SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 23, 2024, at 1039 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contacted by Roadrunner personnel in Orlando, Florida regarding the release of Eucalyptus Polybractea. Contractors were dispatched to the site to perform all onsite clean-up activities. Upon arrival, contractors confirmed that there was 1 damaged 55-gallon DM of Eucalyptus Polybractea, which was wrapped in plastic to stop the leak. No puddling was found outside of the plastic wrapping where the drum was located. Contractors secured the drum with additional wrapping and placed it in a 95-gallon overpack to be staged onsite. No waste was generated from addressing this release during the ER response.

  • Description: It was reported that due to the shrink wrap being loose and the bucket falling off, approximately 1 cup of Rema Bond Cement (Hazardous - UN1133) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS.

item.title: Report I-2024070087
item.description:
Report I-2024070087

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-13
  • City: Pensacola
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 07/13/2024 this shipment containing hidden dangerous goods was discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL PNS Service Center, 5601 Joe Elliot Way Pensacola, FL 32503 Transportation by road has been confirmed.
